basics.name: Alvin Mahmud
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Frontend-focused software engineer with React and TypeScript experience, plus backend development exposure.

work.name: Software Engineer
work.summary: At Clover, I worked on web dashboards for business owners, focusing on flows like Payroll, Employees, and Merchant Profile. I used React and TypeScript to build components and enhance the overall UI/UX. I also collaborated closely with design/product teams to align on features as well as backend engineers to integrate APIs and handle data.
highlights: React, Typescript, Java, Spring Boot, Git, Docker, Kubernetes, GCP, Kafka

work.name: Lead System Administrator
work.summary: At SOBA, I was one of the lead system administrators, where I used Python to automate tasks like user onboarding and system maintenance. I managed Active Directory for account and access control, and handled the organizationâ€™s phone systems and internet infrastructure to ensure everything ran smoothly.
highlights: Python, Raspberry Pi, Linux, Active Directory

work.name: Software Engineer Research Assistant
work.summary: As a research intern at Stony Brook, I collaborated with a team of students to build a web platform for managing class assignments and student submissions. We used Java and MongoDB for the backend and JavaScript on the frontend, aiming to streamline the submission process for both students and the professor.
